front.title: Static pseudowire configuration checking using Generic Associated Channel (G-ACh) Advertisement Protocol

abstract.t: This draft introduces a way to do static pseudowire configuration checking, so as to easy the trouble shooting of static PW in MPLS-TP. The idea is to use Generic Associated Channel (G-ACh) Advertisement Protocol (GAP) [I-D.ietf-mpls-gach-adv] in underlying PSN Tunnel to transfer PW configuration parameters, to achieve static PW configuration checking.
